metadata.Title: CVE-2021-23158 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in htmldoc in v1.9.12. Double-free in function pspdf_export(),in ps-pdf.cxx may result in a write-what-where condition, allowing an attacker to execute arbitrary code and denial of service.

criterions.comment: htmldoc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
